short_summary: Modify Intrusion Detection and Access Control System
description: Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has a requirement to modify the existing Intrusion Detection and Access Control System at the AAFC Lacombe Research and Development Centre, located in Lacombe AB.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Information

* **Tender Title:** Modification of the Existing Intrusion Detection and Access Control System at the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Lacombe Research and Development Centre
* **Reference Number:** cb-6136-83346650
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 465-1-31-C20
* **Publication Date:** 2023-06-02
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-06-17T17:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-06-17
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Industry Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

## Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites pre-qualified suppliers to participate in the tender for the modification of the existing Intrusion Detection and Access Control System at the AAFC Lacombe Research and Development Centre, located in Lacombe, Alberta.

The tender requires the integration of a new Intrusion Detection and Access Control System (IDACS), repair, upgrade, and/or expansion of existing IDACS, including the purchase of hardware, software, and IDACS services. Bidders must possess a pre-qualification status under Supply Arrangement E60HN-200ACS and download the solicitation document from Canada Buys to submit a response.

## Key Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-17T17:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

## Evaluation Criteria

Bidders must meet the mandatory technical criteria, including a site visit and a debriefing request. The evaluation will be based on the lowest price.

## Contact Information

* Desta Kissack, Contracting Authority
* Email: destinations.kissack@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: (204) 583-8127

Note: The rewritten text only includes relevant information
